sample_articles.title: Economic Growth Report
sample_articles.content: The economy grew by 3.2% in the last quarter according to official government statistics. This represents a significant improvement from the previous quarter's 2.1% growth. Economists believe this trend will continue into next year.

sample_articles.title: Opinion on New Policy
sample_articles.content: The new healthcare policy is absolutely terrible and will destroy our economy. I believe this is the worst decision the government has ever made. People should be outraged by this devastating policy.

sample_articles.title: Mixed News Report
sample_articles.content: The unemployment rate dropped to 4.2% last month, according to the Bureau of Labor Statistics. This is encouraging news for job seekers. However, some economists worry that this might not be sustainable in the long term.
